name: autofilterbot
description: Telegram Bot to Automatically Search, Filter and Index Files.

MONGODB_URI.description: Mongodb URI obtained from mongodb atlas, filled with username and password.

ADNINS.description: Telegram ids of administrators of the bot, separated by spaces.

FILE_CHANNELS.description: Telegram chat ids of channels where the bot scans for new files, separated by spaces.

LOG_LEVEL.description: Optional. Log level to be printed out or recorded, defaults to info.
